title: Venarian Gold
text: Enchant creatureWhen Venarian Gold enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and put a number of sleep counters on it equal to the value of X as you cast Venarian Gold.Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step if it has a sleep counter on it.At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, remove a sleep counter from that creature.
